channel.title: proFUN!dity podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a silly way, and nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a serious way.
channel.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
channel.itunes:summary: Nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a silly way, and nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a serious way. Noted 'Favorite Snarky White Guy' Andrew Whipple rambles about life, pop culture, science, philosophy, comedy, tech, and coffee for about an hour every week.
channel.description: Nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a silly way, and nothing is so serious that it can't be talked about in a serious way. Noted 'Favorite Snarky White Guy' Andrew Whipple rambles about life, pop culture, science, philosophy, comedy, tech, and coffee for about an hour every week.
channel.itunes:keywords: whipple, technology, ramble, monologue, pop culture, philosophy

item.title: Episode F: From WBEZ Chicago
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast gets meta.
item.itunes:summary:
Act One: Sarah Koenig discusses campus housing. Act Two: Sarah Koenig on the nature of Apple fanboyism. Act Three: Nightmare Before Christmas? Sarah Koenig investigates. Act Four: We try to remember a This American Life contributer that isn't Sarah Koenig.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: Episode E: *Sexy Pen Click Noise*
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast reminisces.
item.itunes:summary:
A post-mortem. A retrospective. A check-in. Other words that could describe a scenario whereby I spend an hour dissecting and discussing what it was like to GO TO A TAYLOR SWIFT CONCERT OH MY GOD GUYS.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: Episode D: Audience Surrogate
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast returns to form.
item.itunes:summary:
I've got one thing to talk to y'all about. Just wait. It's a real good topic.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: Episode C: SCOPIN'
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast gets visual.
item.itunes:summary:
This may very well be unlistenable, but that's okay because the LIVESTREAMED PERISCOPE THAT HAPPENED DURING RECORDING was probably also unwatchable. Discussions about podcasts, Southern Gothic Literature, and ethical consumerism, all while getting VERY DISTRACTED BY, AGAIN, THE PERISCOPIN'.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: Episode B: Carly Bae Jepsen
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast takes you to the feeling.
item.itunes:summary:
This is it, ladies and gentlemen, strap in your seatbelt and BUCKLE THE FRICK UP BECAUSE WE'RE TALKING ABOUT ONE* THING AND ONE THING ONLY** TONIGHT.

*Well, not just one thing, because tangents.

**Yeah. A heck o' a lot o' tangents.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: Episode A: Radio Reset
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast resets.
item.itunes:summary:
MICROPHONES! APARTMENTS! NIHILIST CLOWNS! THE DAMNWELLS! PURPOSEFULLY AVOIDING TALKING ABOUT PERSONAL STUFF! LIVE TROUBLESHOOTING! HELL YEAH.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

Download
